mapper.insert: insert into ABANDONEDANIMAL(SNUMBER, NAME, SPECIES, KIND, GENDER, AGE, WEIGHT, IMGPATH, LOCATION, ADMISSIONDATE, UNIQUENESS, DESCRIPTION, VIDEO, ANIMALSTATE) values (#{sNumber}, #{name}, #{species}, #{kind}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{weight}, #{weight}, #{imgPath}, #{location}, #{admissionDate}, #{uniqueness}, #{description}, #{video}, #{animalState})
mapper.update: update ABANDONEDANIMAL set SNUMBER = #{sNumber}, NAME = #{name}, SPECIES = #{species}, KIND = #{kind}, GENDER = #{gender}, AGE = #{age}, WEIGHT = #{weight}, IMGPATH = #{imgPath}, LOCATION = #{location}, ADMISSIONDATE = #{admissionDate}, UNIQUENESS = #{uniqueness}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, VIDEO = #{video}, ANIMALSTATE = #{animalState} where ABNUMBER = #{abNumber}
mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM as NUM, A.ABNUMBER, A.NAME, A.LOCATION, A.ADMISSIONDATE, A.IMGPATH FROM (select * from ABANDONEDANIMAL order by ABNUMBER DESC) A) where NUM between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select ROWNUM as NUM, a.* FROM (select p.*,m.Id as userId from Pet p left join MEMBER m on p.MNUMBER=m.MNUMBER order by CPNUMBER DESC) a) where NUM between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into Pet(MNUMBER, NAME, SPECIES, KIND, GENDER) values ((select m.MNUMBER from MEMBER m where m.ID=#{userId}), #{name}, #{species}, #{kind}, #{gender})
mapper.update: update Pet set MNUMBER =(select m.MNUMBER from MEMBER m where m.ID=#{userId}), NAME=#{name}, SPECIES=#{species}, KIND=#{kind}, GENDER=#{gender} where CPNUMBER = #{cpNumber}
